 well at the end of the day. We decided to contact you due to the

We cannot release the fund from his account unless someone applies   funds to be released in your favour as

messages.body:
Simon,
your email was forwarded to me ... and not a moment too soon!!!
Ê
I could really use the money.Ê I run a big fishing business in New Bedford, Massachusetts, and I'm the captain of my own vessel, the Pequod.ÊÊThe harvest has been really bad for years and years now.Ê Plus the US gov't is really cracking down on our industry and limiting how many whales we can take each season plus they're making the season shorter and shorter.ÊCompetition from the Japanese is intense, and their boats andÊequipmentÊare much newer than mine.Ê ÊI don't know how much longer I can hold on, and I need to get new harpoons and whaleboats for the upcoming whaling season.Ê
Ê
And you wouldn't believe how hard it is to find help these days.Ê My latest hire is a some tall guy from some Island in the South Pacific, and he's got tatoos all over him, including his face.Ê His name is Queequeeg, and believe you me it took me a month just to learn how to pronounce it, much less spell it!!Ê Talk about an odd duck.Ê He sits on the deck all day rolling these strange dice made out of bones.Ê But he's tops with a harpoon.Ê
Ê
I'm getting depressed though.Ê I'll never pass for a next of kin for anyone, especially not an Englishman.Ê I don't even own a skinny umbrella to lean on.Ê Plus, because of an unfortunate incident on a whaling trip some years ago, I lost my left leg just above the knee, and I've had to use a prosthetic ever since.Ê
Ê
So, I don't think it will work unless you see a way out of the dilemma.Ê Thanks,
Ê
Your friend,
Ahab, Captain, the Pequod
Ê
